Headline: #71 71st/South Shore Temporary Reroute at Commercial/103rd
ShortDescription: 71 71st/South Shore buses are temporarily rerouted via Torrence, 100th and Commercial : due to, street blockage near Commercial/103rd.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How will this affect my trip?

 

#71 71st/South Shore buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Torrence, 100th, Commercial and over regular route, due to street blockage near Commercial/103rd.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #71 71st/South Shore Temporary Reroute near 71st/Cottage Grove
ShortDescription: 71 71st/South Shore buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions near 71st, King Drive, 67th, South Chicago and 71st, near 71st/Cottage Grove.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How will this affect my trip?

 

#71 71st/South Shore buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions near 71st, King Drive, 67th, South Chicago, 71st and over regular route, due to street blockage, near 71st/Cottage Grove.

 

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #52 Kedzie/California Temporary Reroute at Cermak/Kedzie
ShortDescription: #52 Kedzie/California buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Kedzie, Marshall, Ogden, due to street blockage near Cermak/Kedzie.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#52 Kedzie/California buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Kedzie, Marshall, Ogden, then resume their normal route, due to street blockage near Cermak/Kedzie.

Allow extra travel time.
